doc.field: Brooklyn Sixth Ward, First Election District poll list
Brooklyn Sixth Ward, First Election District poll list

Poll list compiled in 1871 by the Clerks of Election of the First Election District of the Sixth Ward of Brooklyn from the results of an 1870 election. The list includes the names and addresses of 1,328 voters, as well as marks indicating which issues each person voted upon.

Poll list compiled in 1871 by the Clerks of Election of the First Election District of the Sixth Ward of Brooklyn from the results of an 1870 election. The list includes the names and addresses of 1,328 voters, as well as marks indicating which issues each person voted upon.
Gift of Ludovic Bennet, date unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
